overview:
Roman Reyhani is an LA-based digital media attorney, advising clients at the intersection of entertainment and technology.

Roman’s specialties include film, television, digital media, video games, mobile and social media apps, intellectual property, internet law, regulations, business formation and investment. He works with a broad variety of clients including internet startups, developers, entrepreneurs, hosts, actors, writers, directors, and production companies.

Roman grew up in New Zealand, and represents clients in the United States and abroad.
